data.name: Fantasy Grounds - P2 - The Dark City of the Queen of Spiders 4E Fantasy (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
P2 - The Dark City of the Queen of Spiders

4E Fantasy Token Pack

This product contains all the tokens necessary for the 2nd paragon level 4E adventure.

This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • demon goristro (huge)
  • demon immolith (large)
  • demon mezzodemon (large)
  • demon vrock (large)
  • draegloth (large)
  • dragonborn raider (medium)
  • dragonspawn blackspawn gloomweb (large)
  • dragonspawn deepspawn nightmare (medium)
  • drider shadowspinner (large)
  • drow arachnomancer (medium)
  • drow assassin (medium)
  • drow blademaster (medium)
  • drow demonbinder (medium)
  • drow inquisitor (medium)
  • drow matron (medium)
  • drow necromancer (medium)
  • drow priest (medium)
  • drow sniper (medium)
  • drow spiderguard (medium)
  • drow templar (medium)
  • drow vampire (medium)
  • drow vampire spawn (medium)
  • drow warlord (medium)
  • eidolon venomscorched (large)
  • flameskull demonic (tiny)
  • ghost wailing (medium)
  • ghoul abyssal hungerer (medium)
  • ghoul abyssal (medium)
  • ghoul cleric (medium)
  • ghoul drow horde (medium)
  • ghoul eyebiter (medium)
  • goblin slave (small)
  • golem web (large)
  • hag death (medium)
  • hook horror rotting (large)
  • lich human wizard (medium)
  • mind flayer infiltrator (medium)
  • minotaur savage (large)
  • mummy giant (large)
  • naga bone (large)
  • nightwalker (large)
  • ogre executioner (large)
  • oni demonic (large)
  • rakshasa noble (medium)
  • shunned chuidencha (medium)
  • shunned fithrichen (medium)
  • shunned mithrenda (medium)
  • spider brutal swarm (large)
  • spider cave widow (medium)
  • spider demonweb terror (huge)
  • spider husk (large)
  • troll war (large)
  • umber hulk (large)
  • vampire spawn bloodhunter (medium)
  • wight drow battle commander (medium)
  • wight drow battle (medium)
  • wight slaughter (medium)
  • wraith sword (medium)
  • yochlol (medium)
  • zombie rotter (medium)
  • bodak reaver (medium)
  • bodak skulk (medium)
  • boneclaw (large)
  • cambion hellfire magus (medium)
  • death knight human (medium)
  • demon evistro (medium)

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 12, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requirements: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: P2 - The Dark City of the Queen of Spiders4E Fantasy Token PackThis product contains all the tokens necessary for the 2nd paragon level 4E adventure.This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground II virtual tabletop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
